review: I had met doctor for gynaecology related. ****** *** **** **** ** ********** **. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation for one month. It was for my monthly cycle. Blood test, ultra sound was done. Experience was good. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 10-15 minutes. Doctor was ************* *** friendly. Clinic is hygienic and social distance was followed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Thanks in advance Dr Dershana Ma'am!
Thanks Apollo!
Finally we met appropriate doctor to consult all our queries.

Not recommended if you are going for the first baby as she doesn't explain much about the process. Asks questions but didn't respond positively once we enquired about the relevance of these questions. If you are starting on this journey, she is not the right person to coach/guide you and doesn't feel supportive either.
Very rude and unhelpful. *** *** ******* *** *******, just ordered costly tests. Do not recommend to anyone.
